title: New: Haunted House – Shredder / Trophy Life
content:
It’s amazing how many bands nowadays do without drumkits, opting for electronic kits instead.

What’s equally as intriguing, is how many artists can still make their music sound as good, if not better. These two debut tracks from Detroit quartet Haunted House are unrestricted by their refraining from using a ‘real’ drumkit, and instead ramp up the guitars. Centred around near-anthemic choruses and layered levels of guitar hooks and keyboard lines, Shredder and Trophy Life are clear signals of intent. Check them out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
